description:
This is a market on whether the first 4 overall picks in the NFL draft will be quarterbacks. This market will resolve to “Yes” if the first, second, third, and fourth overall picks in the NFL draft are all listed as quarterbacks as their primary position. This market will resolve to “No” otherwise. The resolution source for this market will be the live television broadcast of the draft as well as official NFL sources (https://www.nfl.com/draft/) or other credible sports databases if necessary (i.e. https://www.pro-football-reference.com/years/2020/draft.htm). In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC)

This market will resolve after the first four picks have been announced in the NFL draft. If the NFL draft is delayed, this market will be delayed until the NFL Draft takes place and the first four picks have been announced. If the NFL draft still has not taken place by June 1, 2021, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

events.title: Will the first 4 picks in the NFL draft all be quarterbacks?

question: Will the first 4 picks in the NFL draft all be quarterbacks?
